thread.title: Hoosiers hope to finish at Maryland
thread.title_full: Hoosiers hope to finish at Maryland

author: Andy Graham 812-331-4215 | agraham@heraldt.com
title: Hoosiers hope to finish at Maryland
text:
Hoosiers hope to finish at Maryland By Andy Graham 812-331-4215 | agraham@heraldt.com heraldtimesonline.com | 1 comment 
Indiana’s soccer men conducted an extensive “bumper drill” segment at practice Tuesday, with goals around 25 yards apart and extra personnel stationed on the perimeter to help keep the ball in play. 
One of the drill’s aims is to hone clinical goal-scoring under pressure, in traffic, at a high pace of play. kAmp?5 :E’D E96 D@CE @7 5C:== E92E 4@F=5 36?67:E 3@E9 x& 2?5 E96 E2=6?E65 E62> E92E 9@DED E96 w@@D:6CD E@?:89E[ |2CJ=2?5’D }@] `g\C2?<65 %6CC2A:?D]k^Am kAmq@E9 E62>D 2C6 2>@?8 E96 ?2E:@?2= =6256CD :?
